text: [Music]
my name is Chris turle I work for train
line and I'm head of cloud and platform
agility train line is all about helping
our customers make smarter Journeys it's
about making the ticket buying process
as easy as possible and giving customers
all the information as they get to their
destination we're currently running the
whole company on AWS so our development
test and production systems are all
running in there the main benefit of AWS
for us is speed of change and
flexibility so 12 months ago we were
doing one release every 6 weeks today
we're doing 70 releases a week we're
currently working on a big data
initiative which will help us harness
train and customer information to tell
our customers which carriages are the
most busy my favorite AWS service is
Lambda um we're currently playing with
some servess architectures which should
help reduce our management overheads and
costs
[Music]
